title: Population living in areas where elevation is below 5 meters (% of total population)
name: en.pop.el5m.zs
readme: Population below 5m is the percentage of the total population living in areas where the elevation is 5 meters or less.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Population below 5m is the percentage of the total population living in areas where the elevation is 5 meters or less.
